en: The sun is shining, it's a lovely day
zh: 阳光灿烂 日子多美

en: A perfect morning for a kid to play
zh: 多好的早晨 适合小孩出门玩耍

en: But you're got lots of bills to pay
zh: 但你还有好多 账单要付

en: What can you do?
Your work real hard and the pay's real low
zh: 你工作真的很拼 但工资真的很低

en: And every hour goes oh, so slow
zh: 每个小时 都度日如年

en: And at the end of the day there's no where to go
zh: 干完一天的活 无处可去

en: Back home to Avenue Q
Have you ever felt like nobody was there
zh: 你是否曾经感觉没有人在你身旁

en: Have you ever felt forgotten in the middle of nowhere
zh: 你是否曾经感觉被遗忘在人山人海中

en: Have you ever felt like you could disappear
zh: 你是否曾经感觉你随时可以消失

en: Like you could fall and no one would hear
zh: 就像你的摔落无人知晓

en: Well, let that lonely feeling wash away
zh: 嗯...就让那种孤独随风逝去

en: Maybe there's a reason to believe you'll be okay
zh: 你会找到一个觉得一切会变好的理由

en: Cause when you don't feel strong enough to stand
zh: 因为你觉得自己无力站起的时候

en: You can reach, reach out your hand
zh: 你可以伸出...伸出你的手

en: Even when the dark comes crashing through
zh: 即使当你的世界被黑暗吞没

en: When you need a friend to carry you
And when you're broken on the ground
You will be found
So let the sun come streaming in
Cause you'll reach up and you'll rise again
zh: 因为你会伸出双手，重新站起

en: Lift your head and look around
You will be found
I don't need you to sell me on reasons to want you
zh: 不需要你说出多么动人的理由来让我需要你

en: I don't need you to search for the proof that I should
zh: 不需要你寻找证据来证明我的选择

en: You don't have to convince me
You don't have to be scared you're not enough
'Cause what we've got going is good
zh: 因为我们现在在一起很好

en: I don't need more reminders of all that's been broken
zh: 不需要谁来提醒我失去的所有

en: I don't need you to fix what I'd rather forget
zh: 也不需要你修复我试图忘记的东西

en: Clear the slate and start over
zh: 扫清障碍，我们从头开始

en: Try to quiet the noises in your head
zh: 忘掉你脑子里那些声音

en: We can't compete with all that
So what if it's us?
zh: 如果我们注定在一起呢

en: What if it's us And only us
zh: 如果就是我们呢，只有我们

en: And what came before won't count anymore or matter?
zh: 你我相遇之前的所有都已是过去时

en: Can we try that?
What if it's you
And what if it's me
zh: 如果你旁边的人就是我呢

en: And what if that's all that we need it to be
zh: 如果这就是命中注定呢

en: And the rest of the world falls away?
zh: 谁在乎世界是否会抛弃我们

en: What do you say?
I never thought there'd be someone like you who would want me
zh: 我从没想过会有你这样的人需要我

en: So I give you ten thousand reasons to not let me go
zh: 所以我会给出一万个理由让我留在你身边

en: But if you really see me
If you like me for me and nothing else
zh: 如果你喜欢的就是我而不为了别的

en: Well, that's all that I've wanted for longer that you could possibly know
zh: 你不会知道我对这有多渴望

en: All these blank and tranquil years
Seems they've dried up all my tears
And while she runs free and fast
Seems my wild days are past
But I miss the mountains
I miss the dizzy heights
All the manic magic days
And the dark depressing nights
I miss the mountains
I miss the highs and lows
All the climbing all the falling
All the while the wild wind blows
Stinging you with snow
And soaking you with rain
I miss the mountains
I miss the pain
Do you wake up in the morning
And need help to lift your head
Do you read obituaries
And feel jealous of the dead
It's like living on a cliffside
Not knowing when you'll dive
Do you know Do you know
What it's like to die alive
When a world that once had color
Fades to white and grey and black
When tomorrow terrifies you
But you'll die if you look back
You don't know
I know you don't know
You say that you're hurting
It sure doesn't show
You don't know
It lays me so low
When you say let go
And I say You don't know
Whenever I see someone less fortunate than I
zh: 每当我看见比我不幸的人

en: And let's face it
who isn't less fortunate than I?
My tender heart tends to start to bleed.
zh: 我纤弱的心脏就开始疼

en: And when someone needs a makeover
I simply have to take over!
zh: 我实在不得不亲自接管

en: I know, I know exactly what they need!
zh: 我知道，我知道他们真正需要什么

en: And even in your case
Though it's the toughest case I've yet to face
zh: 虽然这是我遇到的最艰难的情况

en: Don't worry, I'm determined to succeed!
zh: 别担心，我一定会成功的

en: Follow my lead
you will be Popular!
You're gonna be popular!
I'll teach you the proper poise
zh: 我会教你 在与男孩交谈时

en: When you talk to boys
Little ways to flirt and flounce
I'll show you what shoes to wear!
How to fix your hair!
Everything that really counts to be...
POPULAR!
zh: 和受欢迎有关的重要的事

en: I'll help you be popular!
zh: 我会帮你变得受欢迎的！

en: You'll hang with the right cohorts
You'll be good at sports
Know the slang you've got to know.
zh: 明白你必须明白的时髦俚语

en: So let's start
'Cause you've got an awfully long way to go!
Don't be offended by my frank analysis
zh: 别被我直白的分析冒犯

en: Think of it as personality dialysis
zh: 把它当做一种“性格透析”吧

en: Now that I've chosen to become a Pal, a sis or an advisor
zh: 既然我已经选择做一个朋友，姐妹或者一个顾问

en: There's nobody wiser!
Not when it comes to POPULAR!
zh: 没人比我更了解受欢迎了

en: I know about popular.
and with an assist from me
to be who you'll be
instead of dreary who you were...
zh: 而不是对以前的你生闷气

en: There's nothing that can stop you from becoming popu-ler...
zh: 任何事都无法阻止你变得万众瞩目

en: Never again will she get the best of me
zh: 她再也不能利用最好的我

en: Never again will she take away my freedom
zh: 她再也不能带走我的自由

en: And we won't forget the day we fought for the right to be a little bit naughty.
zh: 我们不会忘记为自己顽皮的权利而奋斗的那天

en: Never again, will the chokey door slam.
zh: 密室的门再也不会被粗暴地关上

en: Never again, will I be bullied and
Never again will I doubt it when my mummy says I'm a miracle.
zh: 当妈妈说我是个奇迹的时候将不再会有疑问

en: Never again will we live behind doors
zh: 我们再也不会生活在门后

en: We are revolting children, living in revolting times
zh: 我们是叛逆的孩子，生活在叛逆的年代

en: We sing revolting songs, using revolting rhymes.
zh: 我们唱着叛逆的歌曲，用着叛逆的韵脚

en: We'll be revolting children til our revoltings done
zh: 我们都是叛逆的孩子，直到我们成功的那一刻

en: And we'll have the Trunchbull bolting, we're REVOLTING!
zh: 我们将打败Trunchbull，我们正在反抗！

en: He got down on one knee but I said no way
Packed my bags and moved into a nu nu nunneray
zh: 我打点行装搬入修道院

en: Joined the gospel choir, our riffs were on fire
zh: 加入唱诗班，我们的即兴演唱热情似火

en: At the top of the charts is where I'm gonna stay
Henry sent me a poem all about my green sleeves
zh: 亨利就我的绿袖子给我写了首诗

en: I changed a couple words put it on a sick beat
zh: 我改了一些词加上奇异的节拍

en: The song blew their minds, next minute I was signed
zh: 这首歌让他们惊喜地与我签约

en: And now I'm writing lyrics for Shakesy P
Since my first son, our family's grown
zh: 从我的第一个儿子开始，我们的家庭逐渐壮大

en: We made a band and got quite well known
zh: 我们组成了一支乐队并且广受欢迎

en: You could perhaps call us the Tudor Von Trapps
zh: 也许你可以称我们为“都铎之声”

en: I'm just kidding, we're called the Royalling Stones
zh: 开玩笑啦，我们是“圣石乐队”

en: We're one of a kind no category
zh: 我们是一个集体不分彼此

en: Too many years lost in his story
zh: 许多年来遗失于他的故事中

en: We're free to take, our crowning glory
zh: 我们可以夺回我们的至高荣耀

en: For five more minutes
We're Six
What a shame yeah my face it cost me the crown
zh: 很遗憾我的容貌使我失去了王冠

en: So I moved to the Haus of Holbein in my hometown
zh: 我前往有着荷尔拜因的家乡

en: His mates were super arty, but I showed them how to party
zh: 他的同伴非常喜欢艺术，但我向他们展示如何寻欢作乐

en: Now on my tour of Prussia everybody gets down
zh: 我在我的普鲁士巡演上倾倒众人

en: Music man tried it on and I was like bye
zh: 音乐人试探撩拨而我只想说再见

en: So I thought "Who needs him?", I can give it a try
zh: 我想:“谁需要他啊？”，我能自己尝试

en: I learned everything, Now all I do is sing
zh: 我学习了一切，现在我只想歌唱

en: And I'll do that until I die
Heard all about these rockin' chicks
zh: 听到这些摇滚女郎们的心声

en: Loved every song and each remix
zh: 爱着每一首歌每一版混音

en: So I went out and found them, And we lay down an album
zh: 于是我去寻找她们，我们合作一张专辑

en: Now I don't need your love, all I need is Six
zh: 现在我不需要你的爱情，我只需要Six

en: Step out, step out of the sun
If you keep getting burned
Step out, step out of the sun
Because you've learned, because you've learned
zh: 因为你已经历，因为你已清楚

en: On the outside always looking in
Will I ever be more than I've always been?
zh: 现在的我是不是已无法改变？

en: 'cause I'm tap, tap, tapping on the glass
zh: 我用手指啪嗒啪嗒点击玻璃

en: Waving through a window
I try to speak, but nobody can hear
zh: 我试着说话，但没人听见

en: So I wait around for an answer to appear
zh: 于是我四处张望等待答案浮现

en: While I'm watch, watch, watching people pass
zh: 我看着人们来来往往走过

en: Waving through a window
Oh, can anybody see
is anybody waving?
We start with stars in our eyes
zh: 我们出生时眼中群星闪烁

en: We start believing that we belong
But every sun doesn't rise
And no one tells you where you went wrong
zh: 没人告诉你是哪一步走错

en: When you're falling in a forest
and there's nobody around
Do you ever really crash
or even make a sound
Hear me now, O thou bleak and unbearable world
zh: 听好，尔这堕落难忍的世界

en: Thou art base and debauched as can be
And a knight with his banners all bravely unfurled
zh: 我这骑士大旗勇敢地飞扬

en: Now hurls down his gauntlet to thee!
I am I, Don Quixote, the Lord of La Mancha
zh: 我就是我，堂吉诃德，拉曼查的领主

en: My destiny calls and I go
And the wild winds of fortune will carry me onward
zh: 幸运的狂飙会策我向前

en: Oh, whithersoever they blow
Whithersoever they blow, onward to glory I go
zh: 任他风吹雨打，向荣誉进发！

en: Hear me heathens and wizards and serpents of sin
zh: 听好，野人、巫师、罪恶的爬虫

en: All your dastardly doings are past
zh: 你们的蝇营狗苟已成历史

en: For a holy endeavor is now to begin
And virtue shall triumph at last
The snow glows white on the mountain tonight, Not a footprint, to be seen
zh: 白雪发亮 今夜铺满山上 没有脚印的地方

en: A kingdom of isolation, and it looks like I'm the Queen
zh: 孤立的王国很荒凉 我是这里的女皇

en: The wind is howling like this swirling storm inside
zh: 风在呼啸 像心里的风暴一样

en: Couldn't keep it in, heaven knows I've tried
zh: 只有天知道 我受过的伤

en: Don't let them in, don't let them see
Be the good girl, You always have to be
zh: 做好女孩 就像你的从前

en: Conceal don't feel
Don't let them know
Well now they know
Let it go
Let it go
Can't hold it back anymore
I don't care
What they're going to say
Let the storm rage on
The cold never bother me anyway
zh: 反正冰天雪地我也不怕

en: My power flurries through the air into the ground
zh: 我力量从空气中扩散到地上

en: My soul is spiraling in frozen fractals all around
zh: 我灵魂盘旋在冰块各种不同形状

en: And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast
zh: 我思想结晶变成锋利的闪光

en: The window is open, so's that door
zh: 所有的门和那窗打开了

en: I didn't know they did that anymore
zh: 我真不知道他们这么做

en: Who knew we owned eight thousands salad plates?
zh: 装沙拉的盘子有八千个

en: For years I've roamed these empty halls
Why have a ballroom with no balls?
Finally they're opening up the gates
There'll be actual real live people
It'll be totally strange
Wow, am I so ready for this change
zh: 但我已准备好这转变了

en: Cuz for the first time in forever
There'll be music, there'll be light
For the first time in forever
I'll be dancing through the night
Don't know if I'm elated or gassy
zh: 不知道我有多喜气洋溢

en: But I'm somewhere in that zone
Cuz for the first time in forever
I won't be alone
For the first time in forever
I'm getting what I'm dreaming of
A chance to change my lonely world
A chance to find true love
Don't let them in, don't let them see
Be the good girl you always have to be
zh: 做好女孩就像你的从前

en: Conceal
Conceal don't feel don't let them know
zh: 隐藏起来，不要感觉，不要让他们知道

en: I know it all ends tomorrow
So it has to be today
Cuz for the first time in forever
For the first time in forever
Nothing's in my way!
You wait, little girl, on an empty stage,
zh: 小女孩在空荡的舞台上等待

en: For fate to turn the light on
Your life, little girl, is an empty page,
zh: 你的生命目前是空白的一页

en: That men will want to write on
You are sixteen going on seventeen
Baby, it's time to think
Better beware, be canny and careful
Baby, you're on the brink
You are sixteen going on seventeen
fellows will fall in line
Eager young lads and rogues and cads
zh: 年少轻狂的年轻人和卑鄙的男人·

en: Will offer you food and wine
Totally unprepared are you
to face a world of men
Timid and shy and scared are you
zh: 怯懦和害羞，你会如此畏惧

en: of things beyond your ken
zh: 当事情超出你的知识范围

en: To dream the impossible dream
To fight the unbeatable foe
To bear with unbearable sorrow
To run where the brave dare not go;
To right the unrightable wrong.
To love, pure and chaste, from afar
zh: 远远地去爱，纯真高洁的心

en: To try, when your arms are too weary
To reach the unreachable star!
This is my Quest to follow that star
zh: 敢以此生 求索那颗星

en: No matter how hopeless, no matter how far
zh: 管它征途遥远，道路多险峻

en: To fight for the right
Without question or pause
To be willing to march into hell
For a heavenly cause!
And I know, if I'll only be true
To this glorious Quest
That my heart will lie peaceful and calm
When I'm laid to my rest.
And the world will be better for this
That one man, scorned and covered with scars
Still strove, with his last ounce of courage
zh: 仍要用伤痕累累的双手

en: To reach the unreachable stars!
And I got my first job flying for a mortician
zh: 我在殡葬业得到了第一份飞行的工作

en: in a tiny bonanza, just a corpse and me
zh: 小小的机舱里只有尸体和我

en: Five dollars an hour for flying dead bodies
zh: 运送尸体只有每小时五美元

en: I had to climb over their faces just to get to my seat
zh: 为来到我的座位我不得不爬过他们

en: And suddenly the wheels lift off
the ground is falling backwards
I am suddenly alive
Suddenly I'm in the cockpit
zh: 突然间，我坐进了驾驶舱

en: Suddenly everything's changed
Suddenly I'm not too young or too short
zh: 突然间，我不再年轻，不再矮小

en: and the passengers in the back don't complain
zh: 而后面的乘客还不会抱怨

en: Suddenly I'm flying company charters
zh: 突然间，我获得了商飞执照

en: Suddenly everything's high
zh: 突然间，一切变得令人欢欣鼓舞

en: Suddenly there's nothing in between me and the sky
zh: 我与天空之间也不再有什么阻碍！

en: Welcome to the show, to the historemix
zh: 欢迎来到演出，观看被重写的历史

en: Switching up the flow as we add the prefix
zh: 加上了前缀，我们焕发新生

en: Everybody knows that we used to be six wives
zh: 大家都知道我们曾是六位妻子

en: Raising up the roof till we hit the ceiling
Get ready for the truth that we'll be revealing
zh: 准备好迎接我们将要揭露的真相

en: Everybody knows that we used to be six wives
zh: 大家都知道我们曾是六位妻子

en: But now we're Ex-wives.
All you ever hear and read about
zh: 你曾经听过读过的一切

en: Is our ex, and the way it ended
zh: 是关于我们的前夫和那些结局

en: But a pair doesn't beat a royal flush
zh: 但是对子打不过同花顺

en: You're gonna find out how we got unfriended
zh: 你将会发现我们是怎么友尽的

en: Tonight, we're gonna do ourselves justice
zh: 今晚我们将为自己讨回公道

en: cause we're taking you to court
zh: 因为我们要带你们去到法庭

en: every Tudor rose has it's thorns
zh: 每朵都铎玫瑰都带着刺

en: and you're gonna hear them live in consort.
zh: 我们将要一起讲述我们的故事

en: In sleep he sang to me
In dreams he came
that voice which calls to me
And speaks my name
And do I dream again
For now I find
The phantom of the opera is there
Inside my mind
Sing once again with me
Our strange duet
My power over you
Grows stronger yet
When I grow up
I will be brave enough to fight the creatures
zh: 我就能勇敢地挑战那些

en: That you have to fight beneath the bed each night to be a grown up.
zh: 床底下的怪兽，因为我们每晚都是大人

en: Just because you find that life's not fair
zh: 若你只是觉得生活不公平

en: it doesn't mean that you just have to grin and bear it!
zh: 那并不意味着你必须要微笑着忍受

en: If you always take it on the chin and wear it
Nothing will change.
Just because I find myself in this story
zh: 若我只是觉得我被困在这故事里

en: It doesn't mean that everything is written for me.
zh: 这并不意味着我的命运已被决定

en: If I think the ending is fixed already
zh: 如果认为我的结局已经注定

en: I might as well be saying
I think that it's OK
And that's not right!
In the eye of a hurricane
There is quiet
For just a moment
A yellow sky
When I was seventeen a hurricane
Destroyed my town
I didn't drown
I couldn't seem to die
I wrote my way out
Wrote everything down far as I could see
zh: 把目所能及的生灵涂炭，写成篇章

en: I wrote my way out
I looked up and the town had its eyes on me
zh: 我抬头，看见了家乡对我的注目

en: They passed a plate around
Total strangers
Moved to kindness by my story
Raised enough for me to book passage on a
Ship that was New York bound
I wrote my way out of hell
zh: 我的文笔让我逃离了地狱

en: I wrote my way to revolution
zh: 我的文笔谱写了革命的辉煌

en: I was louder than the crack in the bell
zh: 我呼喊的能量 比自由之钟更强

en: I wrote Eliza love letters until she fell
zh: 我写了绵绵情书 终获Eliza的芳心

en: I wrote about The Constitution and defended it well
zh: 宪法威严得以捍卫，也因我写下的浩瀚篇章

en: And in the face of ignorance and resistance
zh: 顶着重重的无知与阻力

en: I wrote financial systems into existence
zh: 我将金融系统谱写于世上

en: And when my prayers to God were met with indifference
zh: 当我的祷告遭到上帝的冷遇

en: I picked up a pen, I wrote my own deliverance
zh: 我拿起笔, 写出自我救赎的方向

en: My grandfather was a fire and brimstone preacher
But there are things that the Homilies and hymns won't teach ya
zh: 可是也有些东西是讲道和圣歌中未提及的

en: My mother was a genius
My father commanded respect
When they died they left no instructions
zh: 他们过世前没来得及留下任何话

en: Just a legacy to protect
zh: 只留下沉重的家族名誉让我守护

en: Death doesn't discriminate
Between the sinners and the saints
It takes and it takes and it takes
zh: 死亡一味索取人的青春、活力和性命

en: And we keep living anyway
We rise and we fall And we break
And we make our mistakes
And if there's a reason I'm still alive
When everyone who loves me has died
zh: 即便爱我的人都已不在

en: I'm willing to wait for it
I'm willing to wait for it
Wait for it Wait for it
I am the one thing in life I can control
I am inimitable
I am an original
I'm not falling behind or running late
zh: 伺机而动不意味着我退缩落后

en: I'm not standing still
I am lying in wait
zh: 我暗中潜伏，到时必将一击制胜

en: Hamilton faces an endless uphill climb
zh: 汉密尔顿还在奋力攀登高不可及的山峰

en: He has something to prove
He has nothing to lose
Hamilton's pace is relentless
zh: 汉密尔顿肆无忌惮向前冲

en: He wastes no time
What is it like in his shoes?
zh: 做汉密尔顿是什么滋味？
